meanings.definition: Alone or singular in a category or group.
meanings.sent1: She was the onliest student in the class.
meanings.sent2: The onliest flower in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent3: Being the onliest one at the party made her feel special.
meanings.sent4: The onliest tree standing tall in the field symbolized resilience.
meanings.sent5: The onliest star in the sky shone brightly.

meanings.definition: The one and only; unique or exclusive.
meanings.sent1: To her, he was the onliest person who truly understood her.
meanings.sent2: The onliest painting in the gallery caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: His onliest possession was a rare antique coin.
meanings.sent4: She considered her onliest friend a treasure beyond compare.
meanings.sent5: The onliest key to the mysterious chest was hidden in the attic.
